meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the sixth hour of the day.
meanings.sent1: The sextan sun was high in the sky at noon.
meanings.sent2: The sextan hour is when many people have lunch.
meanings.sent3: The sextan time is perfect for a picnic under the bright sun.
meanings.sent4: She felt the warmth of the sextan rays on her face.
meanings.sent5: The sextan hour painted the landscape in golden hues.

meanings.definition: A person who is six years old.
meanings.sent1: The little sextan was excited for their birthday party.
meanings.sent2: The school had a special program for the sextan students.
meanings.sent3: The sextan giggled as they played with their toys.
meanings.sent4: She watched the sextan run around the playground with joy.
meanings.sent5: The sextan's laughter filled the room with happiness.

meanings.sent1: The sailor used the sextan to navigate the open sea.
meanings.sent2: The antique sextan was displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The captain relied on the sextan to chart the course.
meanings.sent4: She marveled at the intricate design of the sextan.
meanings.sent5: The sextan guided them safely through the waters.
